original_title: Erica Lynne Is Badd: The XXX Home Movies
overview: She was the baddest of The Bad Girls Club, Miami. And now, Erica Lynne, "The Trash Talking Cheerleader" takes us where no camera has gone before, into her bedroom for some red hot sex with her nasty boytoy Adrian. She caused one "altercation" after another and caused Bad Girls Five to beat every prior season - with the most watched premiere in the history of the network! Now you'll see she's not afraid to rumble under the sheets either! Does this smoking' hot blonde know how to move that fine round azz? Yup. Is she bad? You don't know the half of it. Check it out!
title: Erica Lynne Is Badd: The XXX Home Movies
